summary: Utility functions that translate reversible function representations—particularly those produced by the Tweedledum library—into Qiskit QuantumCircuit objects, handling the mapping of low‑level operators to standard Qiskit gates and managing circuit construction details.
business_intent: Allow seamless integration of classical reversible logic synthesized with external tools into Qiskit workflows, enabling users to convert, compile, and execute such functions on quantum hardware or simulators without manual gate‑level translation.
